Offense: Aggressiveness in attacking and conquering other civilizations
Defense: Prioritization of defensive units and fortifications
CityDefense: Focus on protecting cities through walls and defensive buildings
MilitaryTraining: Emphasis on military unit production and experience buildings
Recon: Preference for scouting units and exploration
Ranged: Prioritization of ranged and siege units
Mobile: Focus on fast-moving cavalry and mechanized units
UseNuke: Willingness to actually use nuclear weapons
Naval: Emphasis on naval unit production and sea power
NavalRecon: Focus on naval exploration and scouting
NavalGrowth: Expansion and growth through coastal cities
NavalTileImprovement: Development of sea resources and coastal improvements
Air: Prioritization of air units and air superiority
AirCarrier: Focus on aircraft carriers and naval aviation
Airlift: Use of airlift capabilities for rapid deployment
Growth: Focus on population growth and food production
TileImprovement: Emphasis on improving tiles and terrain
Infrastructure: Prioritization of buildings and city development
Production: Focus on production output and manufacturing
WaterConnection: Emphasis on coastal cities and harbors
Gold: Focus on economic development and wealth generation
Science: Prioritization of scientific advancement and research
Culture: Emphasis on cultural development and policies
Happiness: Focus on maintaining citizen happiness and luxury resources
Religion: Focus on founding and spreading religion
Diplomacy: Emphasis on diplomatic relations and city-states
Spaceship: Focus on space race and science victory
Espionage: Prioritization of spy networks and intelligence
